5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Ibn ‘Abbas that the Prophet (ﷺ) used to recite in the ‘Eid prayer “Glorify the Name of your Lord, the Most High.” [Al-A’la (87)] and “Has there come to you the narration of the overwhelming?” [Al-Ghashiyah]

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي الْقِرَاءَةِ فِي صَلاَةِ الْعِيدَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: What was narrated concerning the recitation in the ‘Eid Prayers
